a.n: For fun only - chasing the wind balloons

p.k: In the next episode we meet people who are passionate about hot air ballooning. At the balloon festival in Szczecinek, we meet dozens of crews for whom ballooning is the major
p.d: In the next episode we meet people who are passionate about hot air ballooning. At the balloon festival in Szczecinek, we meet dozens of crews for whom ballooning is the major part of life. We will learn how to fly a hot air balloon and why this sport gives people such a unique experience.
